answers.answer: Geez......how many physicians have you seen and what were their specialities?

question: I have been told I have PCOS. Hasimotos, Diabetes Isipudis , POTS, Nureocardigenic syncope,  Fibromyalgia.  Digestive issues. and Dysautonomia related also to ANS and many more Diagnosis. I am only 24. How can someone so young have so many? It is like I get one Diagnosis after the other. I keep reading and it seems as if it all points to my hypothalumus. Why is it I am seeing this all relating  but the Dr's are not?
title: I am 24 and have about 12 different Diagnosis, I don't know what to do!
